nodes.text: The M4-T3 Astromech Droid was a model of astromech droid that was used for various tasks at Sobrik Spaceport, the main spaceport in the city of Sobrik on the planet Balmorra, while the city was under Imperial rule.
M4-T3 Astromech Droids appear as friendly characters in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where they can be found in Sobrik Spaceport in the Imperial version of Balmorra.
